mutants.code:
def sort_rows(arr):
    row_sums = [sum(row) for row in arr]
    rows_with_sums = [(row_sum, row) for (row_sum, row) in zip(row_sums, arr) if not any((num < 0 for num in row))]
    sorted_rows = sorted(rows_with_sums, key=lambda x: x[0], reverse=False)
    sorted_arr = [row for (_, row) in sorted_rows]
    return sorted_arr

def sort_rows(arr):
    row_sums = [sum(row) for row in arr]
    rows_with_sums = [(row_sum, row) for (row_sum, row) in zip(row_sums, arr) if not any((num < 1 for num in row))]
    sorted_rows = sorted(rows_with_sums, key=lambda x: x[0], reverse=True)
    sorted_arr = [row for (_, row) in sorted_rows]
    return sorted_arr
